document_data.name: Navril
document_data.mainbody: '''Navril''' was an author some time prior to the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and the writer of the ''[[History of the Parsnip]]''.
document_data.History: After spring began in the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, the monks at the entrance of [[Candlekeep]] commented, when seeing the seekers coming after "Roablar of [[Lantan]]" (actually [[Noumea Cardellith]]), that their entrance-gift might well be Navril's ''History of the Parsnip''. He also said they'd reject it one more time, just as they had previously.
